label: Archive Records
description: GraphQL queries for DDR archive records and items

presets.label: RCA Rector's reports
presets.query:
# RCA Rector's reports
{
  record_v1(id: "723540083596") {
    pid
    title
    copyright_holder
    rights_holders
    jpg_derivatives {
      signed_url
      filename
      role
      label
      copyright_holder
      rights_holders
    }
    pdf_files {
      signed_url
      filename
      role
      label
      copyright_holder
      rights_holders
    }
    linked_art_jsonld_url
    linked_art_turtle_url
    linked_art_rdfxml_url
  }
}

presets.label: Recent items
presets.description: Recently updated DDR items with Linked Data endpoints
presets.query:
# Recent DDR items with Linked Data endpoints
{
  items_recent(limit: 12) {
    id
    pid
    title
    scope_and_content
    project_theme
    extent_unit
    creatorcorporate_id
    ddr_period
    fonds_code
    access_level
    copyright_holder
    rights_holders
    date_begin
    date_end
    reference_code
    project_team_staff
    jpg_derivatives {
      signed_url
      filename
      role
      label
      copyright_holder
      rights_holders
    }
    pdf_files {
      signed_url
      filename
      label
      copyright_holder
      rights_holders
    }
    linked_art_jsonld_url
    linked_art_turtle_url
    linked_art_rdfxml_url
  }
}

presets.label: All records
presets.description: All records (both S3 media items and postgres records)
presets.query:
# All records (both S3 media items and postgres records)
{
  items_recent(limit: 50) {
    id
    pid
    title
    scope_and_content
    project_theme
    extent_unit
    creatorcorporate_id
    ddr_period
    fonds_code
    access_level
    copyright_holder
    rights_holders
    date_begin
    date_end
    reference_code
    creator_agent_label
    creator_agent
    funder_agent_label
    project_team_staff
    jpg_derivatives {
      signed_url
      filename
      role
      label
      copyright_holder
      rights_holders
    }
    pdf_files {
      signed_url
      filename
      role
      label
      copyright_holder
      rights_holders
    }
    linked_art_jsonld_url
    linked_art_turtle_url
    linked_art_rdfxml_url
  }
}

presets.label: Records with images
presets.description: Records with TIFF-derived images and thumbnails
presets.query:
# Records with actual images
# Uses record_v1 to get a specific record with jpg_display images
{
  record_v1(id: "53") {
    id
    pid
    title
    scope_and_content
    copyright_holder
    rights_holders
    date_begin
    date_end
    fonds_code
    extent_unit
    jpg_derivatives {
      signed_url
      filename
      role
      label
      copyright_holder
      rights_holders
    }
    linked_art_jsonld_url
    linked_art_turtle_url
    linked_art_rdfxml_url
  }
}

presets.label: Records with PDFs
presets.description: Records with PDF attachments and thumbnails
presets.query:
# Records with PDF files
# jpg_derivatives with role='jpg_thumb' are PDF thumbnails
# Look for records where pdf_files array is not empty
{
  items_recent(limit: 50) {
    id
    pid
    title
    scope_and_content
    copyright_holder
    rights_holders
    date_begin
    date_end
    creator_agent_label
    creator_agent
    funder_agent_label
    project_theme
    extent_unit
    project_team_staff
    jpg_derivatives {
      signed_url
      filename
      role
      label
      copyright_holder
      rights_holders
    }
    pdf_files {
      signed_url
      filename
      role
      label
      copyright_holder
      rights_holders
    }
    linked_art_jsonld_url
    linked_art_turtle_url
    linked_art_rdfxml_url
  }
}

presets.label: Single record
presets.description: Single record with attached media and Linked Data
presets.query:
# Single record with attached media + Linked Data
{
  record_v1(id: "19") {
    id
    pid
    title
    status
    scope_and_content
    copyright_holder
    rights_holders
    date_begin
    date_end
    creator_agent_label
    creator_agent
    funder_agent_label
    project_theme
    extent_unit
    project_team_staff
    linked_art_jsonld_url
    linked_art_turtle_url
    linked_art_rdfxml_url
    attached_media {
      id
      pid
      title
      copyright_holder
      pdf_files {
        signed_url
        filename
        role
      label
      copyright_holder
      rights_holders
      }
      jpg_derivatives {
        signed_url
        filename
        role
      label
      copyright_holder
      rights_holders
      }
      linked_art_jsonld_url
      linked_art_turtle_url
      linked_art_rdfxml_url
    }
  }
}

presets.label: Comprehensive single record
presets.query:
# Comprehensive record with all available metadata
# Uses items_recent (first result) which merges child media assets
{
  items_recent(limit: 1) {
    id
    pid
    title
    status
    updated_at
    level
    scope_and_content
    abstract
    date_begin
    date_end
    reference_code
    fonds_code
    series_id
    extent_unit
    extent_number
    access_level
    copyright_holder
    copyright_holder_other
    rights_holders
    rights_statement_uri
    ddr_period
    project_theme
    project_title
    project_job_number
    project_start_date
    project_end_date
    project_duration
    project_outcome
    project_beneficiary_audience
    creator_agent_label
    creator_agent
    funder_agent_label
    funder_agent
    creatorcorporate_id
    project_team_staff
    contributor_agents
    location_repository
    location_accession
    location_box
    location_note
    methodology
    epistemic_stance
    current_consent_status
    consent_evidence_uri
    takedown_contact
    language_codes
    transcript_present
    interviewees
    interview_date
    interview_location
    interview_format
    interview_runtime_minutes
    interview_session_number
    recording_equipment
    publication_links
    jpg_derivatives {
      signed_url
      url
      filename
      role
      mime
      bytes
      label
      copyright_holder
      rights_holders
    }
    pdf_files {
      signed_url
      url
      filename
      role
      mime
      bytes
      label
      copyright_holder
      rights_holders
    }
    creators
    subjects
    parent_collection
    linked_art_jsonld_url
    linked_art_turtle_url
    linked_art_rdfxml_url
    public_uri
  }
}
